CEEvent.Name: BC_event_male_harem_new
CEEvent.Text: {CAPTIVE_NAME} is brought through by the ladies of your harem.

Option.OptionText: Have the ladies of the harem welcome her.

CEEvent.Name: BC_event_male_harem_wife
CEEvent.Text: {CAPTIVE_NAME} is brought through by the ladies of your harem.

Option.OptionText: Have the ladies of the harem welcome h{?ISCAPTIVEFEMALE}er{?}im{\?}.

CEEvent.Name: BC_event_male_harem_test
CEEvent.Text: Your Procuress at the harem hurriedly comes to you with whispered news about {CAPTIVE_NAME}: while being prepared for you, she confessed that she has never shared her bed with any man! "I knew to bring this to you at once, Efendi."

Option.OptionText: This changes nothing. Have her brought immediately.
On second thought, this calls for a new strategy...

CEEvent.Name: BC_event_male_harem_menu
CEEvent.Text: {CAPTIVE_NAME} is presented to you by the ladies of your harem.

Option.OptionText: Strip h{?ISCAPTIVEFEMALE}er{?}im{\?} down to shackles.
Have h{?ISCAPTIVEFEMALE}er{?}im{\?} prepared for your chambers.
Have a chat with the Procuress about {CAPTIVE_NAME}.
Leave.

CEEvent.Name: BC_event_male_procuress
CEEvent.Text: You are chatting with your Procuress of Whores. "Your wish is our command, Most Omnimpotent {?PLAYER.GENDER}Mistress{?}Master{\?}."

Option.OptionText: Reserve her womb as your own.
Breed her. Now.
Relinquish your claim on her womb.
Make her an army whore.
She's no longer your army's whore.
{=DefaultCaptorRequiredEventsFemale10}Secure a iron collar around her neck, she will remain to serve as your slave.
Release her as your slave.
Have the Procuress acquire a fresh girl for you.
Have the Procuress acquire a large group of girls at the slave market.
Leave.

CEEvent.Name: BC_event_male_procuress_m
CEEvent.Text: You are chatting with your Procuress of Male Whores. "Your wish is our command, Most Omnimpotent {?PLAYER.GENDER}Mistress{?}Master{\?}."

Option.OptionText: Make him your household slave.
Return the slave to prison.
Leave.

CEEvent.Name: BC_event_male_harem_prefs_m
CEEvent.Text: "How may we please you today, Great One?"

Option.OptionText: Tell the Procuress to acquire a fresh boy for you.
Leave.

CEEvent.Name: BC_harem_slave_dealer
CEEvent.Text: A slave trader approaches...

Option.OptionText: Take a look at the merchandise.
Perhaps you have enough camp followers right now.

CEEvent.Name: BC_harem_slave_dealer_random
CEEvent.Text: A slave trader approaches with a deal on a virgin. A shy young beauty, perfumed and draped in silks, is brought to you.

Option.OptionText: Purchase her. (5000 {GOLD_ICON})
Perhaps you have enough camp followers right now.

CEEvent.Name: BC_harem_slave_dealer_aserai
CEEvent.Text: A shy young Aserai beauty, perfumed and draped in silks, is brought to you.

Option.OptionText: Purchase her. (5000 {GOLD_ICON})
Perhaps you have enough camp followers right now.

CEEvent.Name: BC_harem_slave_dealer_battania
CEEvent.Text: A shy young Battanian beauty, perfumed and draped in silks, is brought to you.

Option.OptionText: Purchase her. (4000 {GOLD_ICON})
Perhaps you have enough camp followers right now.

CEEvent.Name: BC_harem_slave_dealer_empire
CEEvent.Text: A shy young Empire beauty, perfumed and draped in silks, is brought to you.

Option.OptionText: Purchase her. (5000 {GOLD_ICON})
Perhaps you have enough camp followers right now.

CEEvent.Name: BC_harem_slave_dealer_khuzait
CEEvent.Text: A shy young Khuzait beauty, perfumed and draped in silks, is brought to you.

Option.OptionText: Purchase her. (5000 {GOLD_ICON})
Perhaps you have enough camp followers right now.

CEEvent.Name: BC_harem_slave_dealer_sturgia
CEEvent.Text: A shy young Sturgian beauty, perfumed and draped in silks, is brought to you.

Option.OptionText: Purchase her. (5000 {GOLD_ICON})
Perhaps you have enough camp followers right now.

CEEvent.Name: BC_harem_slave_dealer_vlandia
CEEvent.Text: A shy young Vlandian beauty, perfumed and draped in silks, is brought to you.

Option.OptionText: Purchase her. (5000 {GOLD_ICON})
Perhaps you have enough camp followers right now.

CEEvent.Name: BC_harem_slave_bundle
CEEvent.Text: Your dealer, a man with an eye and appetites which you must admit far surpass your own in their depths of cruelty, promises your money back if you are dissatisfied with a single one of the girls he has handpicked for you.

Option.OptionText: Purchase some of them. (5000 {GOLD_ICON})
Purchase all of them. (15000 {GOLD_ICON})
Perhaps you have enough camp followers right now.

CEEvent.Name: BC_harem_slave_boy_random
CEEvent.Text: A slave trader approaches with a deal on a young man. A shy, handsome boy is brought to you.

Option.OptionText: Purchase him. (1000 {GOLD_ICON})
Perhaps you have enough camp followers right now.

CEEvent.Name: BC_event_male_barracks_new
CEEvent.Text: Your men gather around as you lead {CAPTIVE_NAME} through the barracks, sniffing the very air as she passes...

Option.OptionText: Make sure {CAPTIVE_NAME} gets a good view of army life.

CEEvent.Name: BC_event_male_barracks_wife
CEEvent.Text: Your men gather around as you lead {CAPTIVE_NAME} through the barracks, whooping and making lewd gestures...

Option.OptionText: Make sure {CAPTIVE_NAME} gets a good view of your most intimidating men.

CEEvent.Name: BC_event_male_barracks_menu
CEEvent.Text: Your men gather around as you lead {CAPTIVE_NAME} through the barracks, whooping and making lewd gestures...

Option.OptionText: Introduce her to military discipline.
Warn her that if she displeases you, you will throw her to the men.
Leave her perfumed and silked flesh with the men, as a treat.
Show her the tortures which await the disobedient.

CEEvent.Name: BC_event_male_barracks_menu_m
CEEvent.Text: Your men gather around as you lead {CAPTIVE_NAME} through the barracks, whooping and making lewd gestures...

Option.OptionText: Warn him that if he displeases you, you will leave him with the men as a treat.
Whip him in front of the troops.
Send him to the torturers in shackles.
